html:
Thanks to its modern infrastructure and its comprehensive logistics operation, the Yurimaguas - Nueva Reforma Port Terminal, operated by the Puerto Amazonas SA (Copam) Concessionaire, carried out - during the second week of November - the unloading and dispatch service of 18 Containers (40 feet) with motorcycles and motorcars from the company Honda Selva del Per?, which will allow it to supply the demand for said vehicles in the geographic area of ??the North Amazon Multimodal Hub, mainly in the cities of Yurimaguas, San Mart?n and Piura.

In the next few days, the aforementioned company plans to increase its cargo movement to 36 containers (40 feet) per month, planning to send all of its cargo at the end of 2021 and the beginning of 2022, operations that make the Yurimaguas Port Terminal - New Reform in its main strategic ally.
